name: Aikido
description: A Japanese martial art that emphasizes blending with the opponent's movements and using their energy against them.

name: Alpine Skiing
description: A discipline of skiing that involves descending snow-covered slopes at high speeds.

name: Aquathlon
description: A multisport race that combines swimming and running, with a focus on speed and endurance.

name: Archery
description: An ancient sport that involves using a bow to shoot arrows at a target for accuracy.

name: Arm Wrestling
description: A strength-based sport where competitors aim to pin each other's arm to a surface.

name: Artistic Gymnastics
description: A gymnastics discipline that involves performing intricate and expressive routines on apparatus like the balance beam and uneven bars.

name: Australian Rules Football
description: A contact sport played on an oval-shaped field, involving kicking an oval ball through goalposts to score points.

name: Auto Racing
description: A motorsport where participants race automobiles in various categories, such as Formula 1, NASCAR, and endurance racing.

name: Badminton
description: A racket sport played with a shuttlecock, where players aim to score points by hitting the shuttlecock over a net.

name: Baseball
description: A bat-and-ball game played between two teams, where the objective is to score runs by hitting a pitched ball.

name: Basketball
description: A team sport played with a ball, where players aim to score points by shooting the ball through the opponent's hoop.

name: Beach Volleyball
description: A variant of volleyball played on a sandy court, often by two-player teams.

name: Biathlon
description: A winter sport that combines cross-country skiing and rifle shooting.

name: Billiards
description: A cue sport played on a rectangular table with pockets, involving balls and a cue stick.

name: Bobsleigh
description: A winter sport where teams of two or four make timed runs down narrow, twisting, banked, ice tracks in a gravity-powered sled.

name: Bodyboarding
description: A water sport where riders lie on a small board and ride waves toward the shore.

name: Bodybuilding
description: A sport that focuses on developing and displaying muscular physique through weightlifting and specific training routines.

name: Bowling
description: A sport where players roll a heavy ball down a lane to knock down pins arranged in a triangular formation.

name: Boxing
description: A combat sport where two fighters face off in a ring, using their fists to strike their opponent.

name: Bull Riding
description: A rodeo sport where riders attempt to stay on the back of a bucking bull for as long as possible.

name: Cano
description: A water sport that involves paddling a canoe or kayak through water courses, often for racing.

name: Capoeira
description: A Brazilian martial art that combines elements of dance, acrobatics, and music, often played as a game.

name: Chess
description: A two-player strategy board game where the objective is to checkmate the opponent's king.

name: Cricket
description: A bat-and-ball game played primarily in England and countries influenced by British culture, with various formats like Test, One-Day, and T20.

name: CrossFit
description: A high-intensity fitness program that combines elements of weightlifting, aerobic exercises, and functional movements.

name: Curling
description: A team sport that involves sliding stones on a sheet of ice towards a target area which is segmented into four concentric circles.

name: Cycling
description: A sport that involves riding bicycles, often in races like road cycling, track cycling, and BMX.

name: Diving
description: A sport where athletes perform acrobatic dives into water, often from a platform or springboard.

name: Dodgeball
description: A team sport where players throw balls at the opposing team members to eliminate them from the game.

name: Equestrian
description: A sport involving horses, with various disciplines including dressage, show jumping, and eventing.

name: Equestrian Vaulting
description: A sport where individuals perform gymnastic and dance movements on the back of a moving horse.

name: Extreme Ironing
description: An extreme sport and performance art where people iron clothes in remote and challenging locations.

name: Fell Running
description: A form of running that takes place on hilly or mountainous terrain, often with steep ascents and descents.

name: Fencing
description: A combat sport involving two competitors who use bladed weapons to score points by making contact with their opponent.

name: Field Hockey
description: A team sport played on a grass or turf field, where players use a curved stick to hit a ball into the opponent's goal.

name: Figure Skating
description: A sport that combines artistic expression and athleticism, where athletes perform on ice with grace and precision.

name: Fistball
description: A team sport that resembles volleyball, where two teams try to score points by hitting a ball over a net and into the opponent's field.

name: Football (American)
description: A team sport played with an oval-shaped ball, where the objective is to score touchdowns by crossing the opponent's goal line.

name: Football (Soccer)
description: The world's most popular sport, played with a round ball, where teams compete to score goals by getting the ball into the opponent's net.

name: Freestyle Wrestling
description: A style of amateur wrestling where competitors can use various techniques to pin their opponent's shoulders to the mat.

name: Frisbee Golf
description: A disc golf sport where players throw a frisbee-like disc into a target basket in as few throws as possible.

name: Golf
description: A precision sport where players use clubs to hit a ball into a series of holes on a course in as few strokes as possible.

name: Gymnastics
description: A sport that involves performing acrobatic and artistic routines on various apparatus, including the balance beam and parallel bars.

name: Handball
description: A team sport played with a ball, where players aim to throw it into the opponent's goal.

name: Handball (Team)
description: A fast-paced team sport played with a ball, where players aim to throw it into the opponent's goal.

name: High Jump
description: A track and field event where athletes attempt to jump over a horizontal bar at measured heights.

name: Horse Racing
description: A sport where horses and jockeys compete in races, typically on a flat track or over hurdles.

name: Horseball
description: A team sport played on horseback, where players try to score goals by throwing a ball through the opponent's goalpost.

name: Ice Hockey
description: A fast-paced team sport played on ice, where players use sticks to hit a puck into the opponent's goal.

name: Jai Alai
description: A sport that involves players using a curved basket-like device to catch and throw a ball against a wall at high speeds.

name: Judo
description: A martial art and combat sport that focuses on throws and grappling techniques to gain control over an opponent.

name: Kabaddi
description: A contact team sport that originated in South Asia, where players try to tag opponents while holding their breath.

name: Karate
description: A martial art that emphasizes striking techniques using the hands, feet, and knees.

name: Kiteboarding
description: An adventure water sport that combines elements of surfing, paragliding, and kite flying.

name: Korfball
description: A mixed-gender team sport that combines elements of basketball and netball, where players score by throwing a ball through a hoop.

name: Lacrosse
description: A team sport played with a small rubber ball and a long-handled stick with a netted pocket, where players aim to score goals.

name: Luge
description: A winter sport where athletes make timed runs down narrow, twisting, banked, ice tracks while lying on their backs.

name: Martial Arts
description: A collective term for various combat practices and disciplines, including karate, judo, taekwondo, and more.

name: Motorsport
description: A category of competitive racing involving vehicles, such as Formula 1, NASCAR, and rally racing.

name: Mountain Biking
description: A cycling discipline that involves off-road biking on rugged terrain, including downhill and cross-country racing.

name: Paddleboarding
description: A water sport where participants stand on a large board and use a paddle to propel themselves through the water.

name: Parkour
description: An athletic training discipline that involves moving rapidly through an environment, overcoming obstacles with fluid movements.

name: Pickleball
description: A racket sport that combines elements of tennis, badminton, and table tennis, played on a smaller court.

name: Polo
description: A team sport played on horseback, where players use mallets to score goals by hitting a ball into the opponent's goal.

name: Powerlifting
description: A strength sport where athletes compete in three lifts: squat, bench press, and deadlift.

name: Racquetball
description: A fast-paced indoor sport played with a small rubber ball and a racquet, often in a four-walled court.

name: Rock Climbing
description: A sport that involves ascending natural rock formations or artificial climbing walls using physical strength and technique.

name: Roller Derby
description: A contact sport played on roller skates, where two teams compete to score points by lapping members of the opposing team.

name: Rowing
description: A water sport where teams or individuals use oars to propel a boat forward in races or recreational outings.

name: Rugby
description: A team sport with various forms, including rugby union and rugby league, where players aim to score by carrying, passing, or kicking the ball.

name: Rugby Sevens
description: A shorter and faster-paced version of rugby union, with teams of seven players, often played in tournaments.

name: Sailing
description: A water sport that involves using wind to propel a boat through water, with various types of sailing races.

name: Shooting
description: A precision sport that involves using firearms or air guns to hit targets, often with multiple disciplines.

name: Skateboarding
description: An action sport that involves riding and performing tricks on a skateboard.

name: Skeleton
description: A winter sport where athletes make timed runs down narrow, twisting, banked, ice tracks while lying face down on a small sled.

name: Snooker
description: A cue sport played on a rectangular table covered with a green cloth, involving skillful potting of colored balls.

name: Surfing
description: A water sport where individuals ride on the surface of ocean waves using a surfboard.

name: Synchronized Swimming
description: A water sport that combines elements of swimming, dance, and gymnastics, performed in synchronized routines.

name: Table Tennis
description: A fast-paced indoor sport played with small paddles and a lightweight ball, often called ping pong.

name: Taekwondo
description: A Korean martial art that emphasizes high, fast kicks and powerful hand techniques.

name: Teamgym
description: A gymnastics discipline that involves teams performing floor routines, trampette, and tumbling exercises.

name: Tennis
description: A racquet sport played on a rectangular court, with the objective of scoring points by hitting the ball over the net.

name: Toe Wrestling
description: A sport where two opponents attempt to pin each other's foot by locking toes and wrestling.

name: Triathlon
description: A multi-sport endurance race that includes swimming, cycling, and running, usually in that order.

name: Ultimate Frisbee
description: A non-contact team sport played with a flying disc, where players score by catching the disc in the opposing team's end zone.

name: Underwater Hockey
description: A sport played at the bottom of a swimming pool, where teams push a puck into the opposing team's goal.

name: Volleyball
description: A team sport played with a ball over a net, with the objective of scoring points by sending the ball into the opponent's court.

name: Wakeboarding
description: A water sport where participants ride a wakeboard over the surface of the water, often towed behind a boat.

name: Weightlifting
description: A strength sport where athletes lift weights in two disciplines: the snatch and the clean and jerk.

name: Wingsuit Flying
description: An extreme sport where individuals wear a special suit with fabric wings to glide through the air.

name: Wrestling
description: A combat sport that involves grappling, takedowns, and pins to defeat an opponent.

name: Yoga
description: A physical, mental, and spiritual practice that includes a combination of postures, breathing exercises, and meditation.

name: Zumba
description: A fitness program that combines dance and aerobic movements to create an enjoyable workout.
